text: Us waqt Elī kī bahū yānī Fīnhās kī bīwī kā pāṅw bhārī thā aur bachchā paidā hone wālā thā. Jab us ne sunā ki Allāh kā sandūq dushman ke hāth meṅ ā gayā hai aur ki susar aur shauhar donoṅ mar gae haiṅ to use itnā saḳht sadmā pahuṅchā ki wuh shadīd dard-e-zah meṅ mubtalā ho gaī. Wuh jhuk gaī, aur bachchā paidā huā.
